mapper.select: SELECT c.STU_NO, c.YEAR, c.SMT, c.DEPT_NAME, c.PROF_NAME, c.SUB_NAME, c.CO_CONTENT, c.SUB_CODE, COALESCE((SELECT ROUND( (SUM(CASE WHEN l.LMS_CHECK = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)), 1 ) AS AttendanceRate FROM UNIVERSITY.LMS l WHERE l.SUB_CODE = c.SUB_CODE GROUP BY l.SUB_CODE ), 0) AS AttendanceRate FROM UNIVERSITY.COURSES c WHERE c.STU_NO =#{STU_NO} and c.year=#{YEAR} and c.smt =#{SMT} ORDER BY c.YEAR, c.SMT

SELECT s.SUB_CODE, s.SUB_NAME,p.PROF_NAME,s.CLASS_CAP,s.SUB_ST_TIME,s.SUB_END_TIME ,s.CO_CONTENT,s.SMT,s.YEAR,s.SUB_POINT,s.SMT,s.YEAR,s.SUB_STATUS FROM subject s JOIN department d ON s.dept_code = d.dept_code JOIN PROFESSOR p ON p.PROF_NO = s.prof_no WHERE d.DEPT_NAME = #{DEPT_NAME} AND s.SMT = #{SMT} AND s.YEAR = #{YEAR} AND SUBSTRING(s.SUB_CODE, 8, 1) = #{STU_GRADE}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO UNIVERSITY.COURSES ( STU_NO, YEAR, SMT, DEPT_NAME, PROF_NAME, SUB_NAME, CO_CONTENT, SUB_CODE ) VALUES ( #{STU_NO}, #{YEAR}, #{SMT}, #{DEPT_NAME}, #{PROF_NAME}, #{SUB_NAME}, #{CO_CONTENT}, #{SUB_CODE} )
mapper.update: UPDATE subject SET sub_status = CASE WHEN sub_status = 'n' THEN 'y' WHEN sub_status = 'y' THEN 'n' ELSE sub_status END WHERE sub_code = #{sub_code}
mapper.select: SELECT c.STU_NO, c.YEAR, c.SMT, c.DEPT_NAME, c.PROF_NAME, c.SUB_NAME, c.CO_CONTENT, c.SUB_CODE, COALESCE((SELECT ROUND( (SUM(CASE WHEN l.LMS_CHECK = 'Y' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) * 100.0 / COUNT(*)), 1 ) AS AttendanceRate FROM UNIVERSITY.LMS l WHERE l.SUB_CODE = c.SUB_CODE GROUP BY l.SUB_CODE ), 0) AS AttendanceRate FROM UNIVERSITY.COURSES c WHERE c.STU_NO =#{loginNo} and c.year!= #{year} or c.smt !=#{smt}
